title: Computational Aerospace Lab by TEMPLATED
main_content: Faculty Ivan Bermejo-Moreno Associate Professor of Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering Email: bermejom@usc.edu Phone: (213) 740-2881 Doctoral students Benjamin Dalman B.Sc., Mechanical Engineering, University of Calgary, Canada M.Sc., Mechanical Engineering, University of Calgary, Canada Email: dalman@usc.edu Thomas Cuvillier B.Sc., New York University, New York Email: thomas.cuvillier@usc.edu Aishwarya Krishnan B.E. Himanshu Email: h190330@usc.edu Undergraduate students Humzah Merchant B.Sc., Mechanical Engineering, University of Southern California (class of 2026) Email: hmerchan@usc.edu Postdoctoral Scholars Jonas Buchmeier (2022). Donya Ramezanian (2021-2022). Ph.D. Students Jonathan Hoy, Ph.D. (2022): Numerical study of shock-wave/turbulent boundary layer interactions on flexible and rigid panels with wall-modeled large-eddy simulations. Jonas Buchmeier, Ph.D. (2022): Tracking and evolution of compressible turbulent flow structures. Xiangyu Gao, Ph.D. (2020) (current: Google): Shock-induced combustion and mixing. Visiting M.Sc. Students Alexander Bussmann (Technical University Munich) (M.Sc. Thesis, May 2019 - Aug 2019): Tracking and Geometry of multiphase turbulent flows. M.Sc. Students Tianyi Bai (USC AME) (Directed Research, Summer, Fall 2020, Spring 2021): Simulation of person-to-person and room-scale droplets/aerosols dispersion. Noah Seador (USC School of Archiecture) (Directed Research, Spring 2021): Simulation of passive air-filtering on liminal architectural surfaces. Yiwei (Lucy) Lyu (USC School of Archiecture) (Directed Research, Spring 2021): Simulation of passive air-filtering on liminal architectural surfaces. Jin Dou (USC CS) (Volunteer Research, 2018-2020): GPU-HPC compressible flow simulation; machine learning for data analysis. Bailin Chen (USC CS) (Volunteer Research, 2019-2020): GPU-HPC compressible flow simulation; machine learning for data analysis. Francisco del Campo Melchor (USC AME) (Directed Research, Summer 2020): Simulation of room-scale droplets/aerosols dispersion. Arjun Pundarika (USC AME) (Directed Research, Summer 2020): Simulation and meshing of supersonic aerodynamics. Saurabh Dube (USC AME) (Directed Research, Spring 2019): Flat-plate turbulent boundary layer simulation. Ram-Srinivasan Shyam-Sundar (USC AME) (Directed Research, Spring 2018): CFD Visualization. Undergraduate Students David Magie (USC AME): CFD simulation of entry, descent and landing space mission. Sinclair Sparkes (USC AME): Meshing and CFD simulation of entry, descent and landing space mission. Marshall Basson (Carleton College - Physics) (USC SURE 2019): Wall-model LES of backward-facing step; Python-based meshing. William Jo (University of Carlifornia, Irvine) (USC SURE 2019): Data mining and particle tracking shock-turbulence interaction datasets. David Nagoshi (USC AME) (Volunteer Research, Spring 2019): CFD simulation. High-School Students Alan Wang (Junior at Arnold O. Beckman High School) (SHINE, 2020): Visualization of Turbulent Flow Structures.
